_description: William of Shoreham, The Seven Deadly Sins — 106 quatrains

BLAdd17376.First Lines:
Senne makeþ many þralÞat scholde be wel
                    fry…
BLAdd17376.Last Lines:
…Nou loke her in pur chariteAnd make hyt þy
                    myrour
